sentences.en: Food production in the Soviet Union plunged dramatically in the early 1930 s.
sentences.cn: 苏联的粮食生产在30年代初期急剧下降.

sentences.en: He seemed so sure of his decision, how could he flip-flop so dramatically now?
sentences.cn: 他当时好像对自己的决定非常肯定，现在怎么会突然有如此巨大的转变呢？

sentences.en: He tipped his head to one side and sighed dramatically.
sentences.cn: 他把头歪向一边，重重地叹了口气。

sentences.en: His tone changed dramatically when he saw the money.
sentences.cn: 当他看到钱时,说话语调发生了戏剧性的变化.

sentences.en: I cut my purchases dramatically by the simple expedient of destroying my credit cards.
sentences.cn: 通过销毁信用卡这一简单的权宜之计，我大幅削减了自己的购物支出。

sentences.en: Other services vary dramatically in quality.
sentences.cn: 其他服务在质量上差别很大。

sentences.en: Our way of life has changed dramatically over the last ten years.
sentences.cn: 在过去10年里我们的生活方式发生了巨大的变化.

sentences.en: She bowed dramatically. "Anastasia Krupnik, at your service," she said.
sentences.cn: 她夸张地鞠了个躬。“阿纳斯塔西娅·克鲁布尼克，随时为您效劳，”她说。

sentences.en: The cost of living has increased dramatically.
The story begins dramatically but the plot peters out before the end.
The window in the cockpit had blown in and the pressure dropped dramatically.
sentences.cn: 驾驶舱的窗户突然向内破裂，气压急剧降低。

sentences.en: Tourist numbers from across the pond have dropped dramatically.
sentences.cn: 来自大西洋彼岸的游客数量已急剧减少。

sentences.en: Trends toward the globalization of industry have dramatically affected food production in California.
sentences.cn: 工业全球化的趋势对加利福尼亚的食品生产影响巨大。

sentences.en: When depressed, they dramatically overindulge in chocolate and sweets.
sentences.cn: 情绪低落的时候，她们就疯狂地猛吃巧克力和糖果。
